mapper.sql: Id, JobName, JobGroup, InvokeTarget, JobMessage, Status, ExceptionInfo, StartTime, FinishTime
mapper.select:
select
from `sys_quartz_job_log` where 1=1
and (`JobName` like '%${search}%' or `JobGroup` like '%${search}%')
order by ${sort}
order by `Id` desc
mapper.update:
update sys_quartz_job_log
JobName = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JobGroup = #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
InvokeTarget = #{invokeTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JobMessage = #{jobMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ExceptionInfo = #{exceptionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
StartTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FinishTime = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from `sys_quartz_job_log` where 1=1
and `JobName` like concat('%', #{jobName}, '%')
and `JobGroup` like concat('%', #{jobGroup}, '%')
and `Status` like concat('%', #{status}, '%')
AND date_format(`StartTime`,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(`StartTime`,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
